channel.title: Is Internet Needed?
channel.description: I got Moparscape on my mum's Vista laptop, which has internet, and it worked fine. I downloaded it onto my flash drive, tried it, and it worked. So, I transferred it to my computer, a Pentium 4, 2.4 GHZ computer, 440 MB RAM. It doesn't have internet, though. Moparscape wouldn't run, or give me a reason why it shut down. I really just wanted to play a game off of my computer, thinking it would just use the the computer as a server, but I'm not sure. Can you run Moparscape without an internet connection??

item.title: Is Internet Needed?
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

why doesnt the computer have internet?

Read full topic

item.title: Is Internet Needed?
item.dc:creator: @rfry11 rfry11
item.description:
@rfry11 wrote:

I want to use the premade server, but it’sd not working. I think it’s because when I downloaded it on Vista, it said it didn’t all download onto my flash drive. It probably only downloaded the files I needed for Vista, so I’m going to run the installer on my computer. Tell ya tomorrow whether or not it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Is Internet Needed?
item.dc:creator: @problemlots_of_them problemlots of them
item.description:
@problemlots_of_them wrote:

depends how you want to run if it you want to host or go on another server no it wont work but if you use local host or the premade rubbish server thingy then yes it should

Read full topic
